validations.maxEmailLengthReached: Email should have at most 50 characters

placeholders.message: Tell me more about your project, your goals, and how I can help.

topMateInfo: For career guidance and resume review, check out my Top Mate profile.
messageFormSubtitle: Got a project idea or inquiry? Reach out, and let’s bring it to life! Fill out the form below, and I’ll get back to you shortly. Looking forward to hearing from you!
contactDetailsMessage: I’m always open to new ideas, collaborations, or just a friendly chat. You can reach me on the following platforms, and don’t forget to check out my latest work on Instagram and GitHub.
pageLoadError: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
sectionLoadError: Failed to load this section. Please try again later.
sorryCouldntSendMsg: Sorry, we couldn't send your message. Please try again later.

downloadDialog.title: Download CV
downloadDialog.description: Would you like to share a quick message before downloading my CV?
